rpg.v4.server.group
Class Group

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      rpg.v4.server.group.Group

public class Group
extends java.util.Observable

An object represenetation of a group. This is created as it needs to be observable, as opposed to the non-observable XML representation V4Group.

Constructor Detail

Group

public Group(V4Group v4Group)
Method Detail

addMember

public void addMember(V4EntityNameKeyPair nkp)
Adds a member to this group unless the member already exists. The name and UUID of V4EntityNameKeyPair is checked as opposed to the object reference because the nkp can be differents due to loading from disk and new Entity objects being created in program.

Parameters:
nkp -

getV4Group

public V4Group getV4Group()
Returns the XML object representation of this group: V4Group.

Returns:
